Desc.entry: Subjects: A Talk About Quilts, including a brief history of quilt making, patchwork and quilting methods and inspiration for their creation; Christmas quilts and children's quilts, including bed quilts, museum replicas and wall-hangings (including the Dore dragon). Mrs Cassidy is the leader of The Dore Quilters and a member of the Quilt Time Group, The Sheffield U3A Patch and Quilt Group, Quilt Hive and the Quilters Guild of the British Isles. Exhibition. Fee charged.
